text: Richard Anderson King (August 30, 1934 â€“ January 15, 2018) was an American politician and educator. He was a member of the Democratic Party. King was born in Ritzville, Washington. He was also an educator teaching at Everett Community College. He retired in 1991. King died on January 15, 2018 in Port Angeles, Washington at the age of 83.30-year legislator Dick King dies at 83 ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Educators from Washington (state) Category:Politicians from Washington (state) Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Dick King (politician)
